Class AbstractExpMADEstimator<D extends Distribution>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.math.statistics.distribution.estimator.AbstractExpMADEstimator<D>
  • Type Parameters:
    D - Distribution to generate.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    DistributionEstimator<D>, ExpMADDistributionEstimator<D>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LogGammaAlternateExpMADEstimator

    public abstract class AbstractExpMADEstimator<D extends Distribution>
extends Object
implements ExpMADDistributionEstimator<D>
    Abstract base class for estimators based on the median and MAD.
